group_1.narration: One afternoon, in a certain place...
A certain group of Magical Girls gathered.

group_1.textLeft: Now, shall we move on to Akira's first@topic?

group_1.textRight: Um, let's see... Do you guys know about the@Daito Apartment Complex?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, Daito Ward.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I know it.
I do too! It's that really large apartment@complex, isn't it?
Yup!
Seems a lot of stuff's been going down@there recently.
People have even vanished, they said.

group_1.textLeft: Vanished?

group_1.textRight: Well, I just heard it from my friend, so it@could just be gossip.
I can't help but worry about it, though.

group_1.textLeft: You think a Witch may be to blame?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
Sooo, shouldn't we look into this?
We should, yes.
It does worry me!
What do you think, Nanaka?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...
Yes, there is indeed a Witch on the@premises...
...of that apartment complex.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]You knew?!
Why did you wait so long to say so?!

group_1.textLeft: It's a long story.

group_1.textRight: How so?

group_1.textLeft: Well, a Magical Girl lives there.

group_1.textRight: In those apartments?!

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I have been in contact with her before.
She explained things very clearly to me@when we talked.
She said, "You need not interfere here."

group_1.textRight: Oh! I see!
And you just accepted that?

group_1.textLeft: I did.

group_1.textRight: What if it's the Witch we're after?

group_1.textLeft: It does not matter who takes care of the Witch.
Our goal is, and always has been, eliminating@Witches. It matters not who does it.

group_1.textRight: So as long as the Witch is taken care of,@it's fine. That's very like you, Nanaka.

group_1.textLeft: Besides, I have no desire to argue over@territory.
As we are all Magical Girls, we should seek@to settle our problems through discussion.

group_1.textRight: That's very Nanaka, too.
(What's so like her is her odd candidness...)
So, what is she like, this Magical Girl?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes...
She looked at me with a steely resolve in@her eyes.
And those eyes had an almost alarming@brightness to them.

group_1.textRight: Like, scary bright?

group_1.textLeft: Quite.
They felt sharp enough to draw blood.@It would put anyone on edge.
In that same gaze, I felt how she had pushed@her heart to its limit.

group_1.textRight: Like two sides of the same coin.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that reminds me. She did say one more@thing to me.

group_1.narration: "This is my home," she said...@"The most important place in my life."
